Name: StatusCake Maintenance Window
Description: Creates a maintenance window in Status Cake for a given set of tests.

Parameters.Name: StatusCake.Name
Parameters.Label: Name
Parameters.HelpText: Description to be shown in StatusCake for the maintenance window.

Parameters.Name: StatusCake.TestIds
Parameters.Label: Test IDs
Parameters.HelpText: Comma separated list of StatusCake Test IDs.

Parameters.Name: StatusCake.Timezone
Parameters.Label: Timezone
Parameters.HelpText: Timezone the maintenance window is defined in.
